user_request: View the shopping cart on amazon. Search for razer nari on amazon, select the first entry, and add it to the cart.
screen_desc: The screenshot displays a product listing for a headset on Amazon. The headset is currently on sale for $49.99, down from the original price of $99.99. It shows shipping details, including a $15.17 shipping fee to the Netherlands and an estimated delivery time of December 15-30. There are options to add the item to the cart or buy it immediately, and it mentions the secure transaction feature.

click on the located at the top.
click on the search suggestion for amazon.com located at the upper left.
click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right.
click on the amazon search bar located at the upper part of the screen, and below the amazon icon.
click on the search result located at the upper left.
click on the product entry "Razer Nari Essential Wireless 7.1 Surround Sound Gaming Headset" located at the middle of the screen.
click on the "Add to Cart" button located at the middle and lower middle part of the screen.
